lines.text: Wait here while I get you a glass of water!
[dives in and swims away, returns with a glass of water]

[she's gone]
Here you are... Darling? Never underestimate the recuperative powers of a woman.

[pours the water out of the glass]
I never touch the stuff myself.

[swimming underwater without a scuba tank]
When you are a skunk you learn to hold your breath for a long time.
